text: Novokhvalynsky () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Yuldybayevsky Selsoviet, Kugarchinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 317 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 18 km from Mrakovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kugarchinsky District
title: Novokhvalynsky
